subject: Horse Racing
Horses
lead_paragraph: Making only his second start, Casino Drive romped to a five-and-three-quarter-length victory Saturday in the $200,000 Peter Pan Stakes for 3-year-olds at Belmont Park.
snippet: Making only his second start, Casino Drive romped to a five-and-three-quarter-length victory Saturday in the $200,000 Peter Pan Stakes for 3-year-olds at Belmont Park.
